Re‑irradiation was deemed high‑risk due to cumulative brainstem dose exceeding 60 Gy. The patient’s tumor harbors PDGFRα amplification, suggesting potential sensitivity to PDGFR inhibition. A separate ongoing phase I/II trial (NCT05234567) is evaluating the selective PDGFRα inhibitor crenolanib (100 mg/m² orally twice daily) in pediatric high‑grade gliomas with PDGFRα amplification.
